homepage.info_text1: This website was created to help you keep track of what you watch. Here you can manage the episodes of a series you've seen, as well as the movies you've already watched or want to watch.
homepage.info_text2: You can share your movie wishlist with your friends, so you can pick a movie together for a movie night.
homepage.info_text3: I'm trying to add lots of useful features to the website. That way, you can find trailers and some links if you want to watch the content online for free.
homepage.series_card_text: Manage the series you're currently watching, want to watch, or have already seen.
homepage.movies_card_text: Manage the movies you've watched and those you want to watch. You can share them with others using the link in the account menu.

user.question_recomendation_help_box_text1: You can do all these by email, by clicking here.
user.question_recomendation_help_box_text2: Or through any of my contact links.
